section.title: Apache Forrest - org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.odt Plugin
section.p: Reads opendocuments and transforms them to xhtml/xdocs

section.title: Samples
section.p: This section includes links to a number of samples using this plugin. The plugin is intended to be self documenting through these samples. If you require further help please ask on the user mailing list.

section.title: Document Title
section.p: The displayed title is taken from the meta-data of the opendocument.

ul.li: If you set the Title field in the document File -> Properties (General Tab) Then this will be used
Otherwise the first header - that is the title of the first section - will be used
Otherwise - at last - the document filename will be used.
